description.value: Your powerful legs allow you to make sudden and dramatic leaps. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Leap]{Leap} as a 2-action activity to double the distance you can Leap vertically, or Leap as a 3-action activity to triple the distance you can Leap vertically. You don't automatically fail @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Long Jump]{Long Jump} for jumping in a different direction than your Stride.
